entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who is being snogged by Romilda Vane. He is described as having a desperate gesture and his face illuminates when he says her name.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who knows that Ron exists and is bewildered by the conversation. He asks who Ron is talking about.

entities.name: romilda vane
entities.description: Romilda Vane is mentioned as the one who is snogging Ron. She is not described in detail but her name has a significant effect on Ron.

relationships.description: Ron is being snogged by Romilda Vane, as mentioned in the conversation.
Harry knows that Ron exists and is bewildered by the conversation.
